short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves Facebook Marketplace search by adding sorting and power search capabilites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Facebook Marketplace with Better Marketplace Pro!

Better Marketplace Pro is designed to optimize your deal hunting on Facebook Marketplace, ensuring you never miss out on a great deal. Our extension helps you identify new listings quickly, streamlining your search and buying process.

Features:
Estimated Date Listed: Adds an estimated date listed back to the grid views on Marketplace, helping you spot new deals as soon as they appear.

Ignore Previously Seen Listings: Adds an option to visually dim listings that you've already seen, enabling your eyes to skip past them and focus on fresh options.

Sort By Newest: Sort categories that do not normally allow sorting.

Power Search: Include additional search results for some areas and search ranges. Works better for wide searches but can do well on narrow searches for populated areas.

Supports max search ranges (500 miles).

Better Marketplace Pro is all about efficiency and speed. With our tool, you can focus on what really matters - securing the best deals quickly.
